tooltip.preview: The preview styling may differ from your website's styling as it uses a default GitHub-like theme. The HTML output can be styled according to your needs.

basic.description: Convert your Markdown content to clean, well-formatted HTML.

steps.title: Basic Steps
steps.input: Enter your Markdown text in the input field
steps.convert: Click 'Convert to HTML' to transform your content
steps.preview: Check the preview to see how your content will look
steps.copy: Copy the generated HTML code for your use

syntax.title: Markdown Syntax

elements.headings: Headings: Use # for h1, ## for h2, etc.
elements.lists: Lists: Use - or * for bullets, 1. for numbered lists

tips.title: Tips & Best Practices

list.title: Usage Tips

list.syntax_check: Double-check your Markdown syntax if the output looks wrong
list.use_sample: Use the sample content to learn Markdown syntax

tips.note: Note: The converter uses GitHub Flavored Markdown syntax and includes support for tables, task lists, and syntax highlighting.

json-to-java-bean.title: JSON to Java Bean Converter
json-to-java-bean.description: Convert JSON objects into Java classes with optional Lombok support

errors.invalid-json: Invalid JSON input. Please check your JSON syntax.

basic.title: Basic Usage
basic.description: Convert your JSON objects into Java Bean classes with proper getters, setters, and optional Lombok support.

steps.title: Basic Steps
steps.input: Enter your JSON in the input field or use the Load Example button
steps.configure: Configure package name, class name, and Lombok settings
steps.generate: Click 'Generate Java Bean' to create the Java class
steps.copy: Copy the generated code for your use

list.title: Available Features
list.type_inference: Smart type inference for JSON values
list.nested_objects: Support for nested objects and arrays

tips.title: Tips & Best Practices

list.title: Usage Tips
list.validate_json: Validate your JSON before generating the class
list.use_lombok: Use Lombok to reduce boilerplate code
list.naming: Use meaningful class names that reflect the data structure
list.package_naming: Follow Java package naming conventions (e.g., com.example.model)
list.complex_types: For complex types, consider generating multiple classes

tips.note: Note: The converter generates standard Java Bean classes with proper encapsulation. Lombok annotations can significantly reduce the amount of boilerplate code.
